title: Sold - 1870's "Active" base ball player albumen image
author: ramram

posts.post_title: Sold - 1870's "Active" base ball player albumen image
posts.post_content:
1870's albumen image of player for the "Active" team.  Image is a large format for its time measuring about 6"x9" with about 4"x6 1/2" showing through the oval mat.  Great content, but the edges outside of the matted area are very rough and there is a partial crease at the knees.  However, in the frame the image is very nice.  Asking $Sold shipped.
Rob M.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=82323&d=1356716669[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=82328&d=1356717141[/IMG]

Bump. One more price adjustment. 

Rob M.
